checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily Wage Calculation page from Settings > Payroll
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title containing 'Daily Wage Calculation'
checks.assertion: Page loads with Daily Wage Calculation configuration interface

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options are available (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for calculation type selection
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options (calendar days, working days, custom days) are selectable

checks.description: Verify salary components can be selected for inclusion in daily wage calculation
checks.selector_hint: checkboxes or multi-select for salary components
checks.assertion: Salary components selection interface is present and functional

checks.description: Verify Daily Wage Calculation configuration page displays current settings
checks.selector_hint: form fields showing selected calculation basis and components
checks.assertion: Configuration state is visible and reflects saved settings

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility Configure page
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title containing 'End of Service eligibility' and 'Configure'
checks.assertion: EOS Configure page loads successfully

checks.description: Verify salary component options for EOS (Basic Only vs Basic + Allowances)
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for salary component selection
checks.assertion: Both Basic Only and Basic + Allowances options are available

checks.description: Verify calculation method options for EOS (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for calculation method
checks.assertion: All calculation method options are selectable

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing which paid leave-type policies will be overwritten
checks.selector_hint: warning message, badge, or notification about policy overrides
checks.assertion: Override indicator is visible to super admins

checks.description: Verify ability to configure specific leave types for EOS calculations
checks.selector_hint: leave type selection interface or configuration table
checks.assertion: Leave type configuration controls are present and accessible

checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily wage calculation page for proration configuration
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title containing 'Daily wage calculation'
checks.assertion: Daily wage calculation page is accessible

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options for salary proration (custom days, calendar days, working days)
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for calculation basis
checks.assertion: All calculation basis options are available for proration configuration

checks.description: Verify warning or state indicator when payroll month is open with prorated transactions
checks.selector_hint: warning message or alert about open payroll month
checks.assertion: Warning is displayed when changes affect active unpaid amounts

checks.description: Verify interface for managing prorated salary transactions (reject/resave)
checks.selector_hint: transaction list or action buttons for reject/resave
checks.assertion: Transaction management interface is present when needed

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to Unpaid Leave calculation method configuration in Leave Policies
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb path or page title showing leave policy configuration
checks.assertion: Leave policy unpaid leave configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing payroll daily wage calculator takes precedence over leave policy formula
checks.selector_hint: greyed-out formula field, disabled state, or precedence messaging
checks.assertion: Override indicator is visible (greyed-out formula or precedence message)

checks.description: Verify day calculation type options in unpaid leave configuration
checks.selector_hint: radio buttons or dropdown for day calculation type
checks.assertion: Day calculation type options are selectable

checks.description: Verify formula display state in unpaid leave configuration
checks.selector_hint: formula field or calculation method display
checks.assertion: Formula state reflects override status from payroll settings

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave deduction configuration
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title for leave policy unpaid leave settings
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify indicator showing global configuration overrides policy-level settings
checks.selector_hint: disabled field, greyed-out option, or override message
checks.assertion: Override indicator shows global configuration takes precedence

checks.description: Verify calculation method display state when global override is active
checks.selector_hint: calculation method field or display
checks.assertion: Calculation method state reflects global override status

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to EOS eligibility configuration page
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title for EOS Configure
checks.assertion: EOS Configure page is accessible

checks.description: Verify daily wage formula display in EOS configuration (basic + allowances / 30)
checks.selector_hint: formula display or calculation method field
checks.assertion: Daily wage formula is displayed correctly

checks.description: Verify calculation basis state and configuration in EOS settings
checks.selector_hint: calculation basis field or display
checks.assertion: Calculation basis is visible and configured

checks.description: Verify remarks or notes section displays calculation details
checks.selector_hint: remarks field or information display
checks.assertion: Remarks section is present and displays calculation information

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to leave salary calculation configuration
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title for leave policy settings
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator for daily rate divisor (30 vs 31 days)
checks.selector_hint: field showing divisor value or override status
checks.assertion: Daily rate divisor override status is visible

checks.description: Verify policy configuration state displays current divisor and calculation method
checks.selector_hint: configuration fields showing divisor and method
checks.assertion: Policy configuration state is visible and reflects settings

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration with remarks display
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title for leave policy
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify remarks section displays daily rate calculation with correct day count
checks.selector_hint: remarks field showing daily rate and day divisor
checks.assertion: Remarks display shows correct number of days for the month

checks.description: Verify system detects and displays correct calendar days for each month
checks.selector_hint: remarks or calculation display showing month-specific day count
checks.assertion: Calendar days are correctly reflected in remarks (e.g., 29 for February in leap year)

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration page
checks.selector_hint: breadcrumb or page title for leave policy
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify daily rate display shows stored rate from leave occurrence month, not payroll processing month
checks.selector_hint: daily rate field or remarks showing rate value
checks.assertion: Daily rate displayed matches the leave occurrence month rate

checks.description: Verify system preserves and displays initially calculated daily rate
checks.selector_hint: rate display field or calculation remarks
checks.assertion: Initially calculated rate is preserved and displayed consistently
